title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. When I hit F4 on a binary project selection, the scoped type hierarchy does not appear as expected. I don't understand why this is happening.
OB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection, the scoped type hierarchy does not appear.
EB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection, the scoped type hierarchy should appear.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the project in the workspace. 
2. Select a binary project. 
3. Press F4 to open the type hierarchy. 
4. Observe that the scoped type hierarchy does not appear.
